apps.name: Application Template
apps.description: A barebones application template, from which the others were created.

apps.name: CharityNet
apps.description: 3 million charitable donations, visualized on a county choropleth map.

apps.name: Dendrogram
apps.description: The Tangelo dendrogram plugin, illustrating the organizational structure on board the starship Enterprise

apps.name: Geo Dots
apps.description: The Tangelo geodots plugin, demonstrating the placement of colored dots on a GeoJSON world map.

apps.name: Geo Node-Link Diagram
apps.description: The Tangelo geonodelink plugin, demonstrating a colored node-link diagram on a GeoJSON world map.

apps.name: Map Dots
apps.description: The Tangelo mapdots plugin, demonstrating the placement of colored dots on a Google Map.

apps.name: Node Link Diagram
apps.description: The Tangelo nodelink plugin, demonstrating how to create an interactive node link diagram.

apps.name: Prime Number Stream
apps.description: A demonstration Tangelo's data streaming feature, computing an endless stream of prime numbers.

apps.name: Vega Builder
apps.description: A live, HTML-based Vega specification editor, with immediate feedback.

apps.name: VTKWeb Integration
apps.description: A demonstration of Tangelo's VTKWeb capabilities: launch a VTKWeb process, interact with it, and shut it down via HTML controls.

apps.name: Document Entity Relationships
apps.description: Discover the network of named entities hidden within text documents

apps.name: Flickr Metadata Maps
apps.description: Explore the locations where millions of Flickr photos were taken

external.name: Vega
external.description: A visualization grammar, based on JSON, for specifying and representing visualizations
